markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Backstabber](/Feats.aspx?ID=1891) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 158 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48)

**Prerequisites**
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890)

</column>

---

When you Strike a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) foe with a weapon that has the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172) weapon trait, you deal 2 extra precision damage instead of 1. If the weapon is a +3 weapon, you deal 4 extra precision damage instead of 2.
name: Expert Backstabber
